name: AlcoholQuiz
0:
”Alexa, open alcohol quiz”
”Alexa, start alcohol quiz”
”Alexa, launch alcohol quiz”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: alcohol quiz
Developer Terms of Use
des:
"Alcohol Quiz" is an Alexa Skill designed to test your knowledge and add a playful twist with a drinking game vibe! Answer with "yes" or "no" to trivia questions and see who scores the most—or who drinks the most! Perfect for parties or casual fun with friends.

💥 SINGLE PLAYER MODE 💥

• Test your knowledge: Answer engaging questions with a simple "yes" or "no."
• Earn points: Each correct answer gives you 1 point.
• Check your score anytime: Just say "stop" to hear your accumulated points.
• Milestones: Your total score will be announced after every 10 questions.

💥 MULTIPLAYER MODE 💥 

• Challenge your friends or family in a fun multiplayer mode (up to 4 players)!
• Scores revealed: Every 20 questions, players' scores will be announced.
• Light-hearted twist: The player with the lowest score will be "encouraged" to hydrate responsibly. 😉

💥 NEW UPGRADE 💥

• Detailed feedback: Get an explanation of the correct answer every time you get a question wrong—no more guessing in the dark!
• Repeat a question: If you didn’t catch it the first time, just say "repeat" and Alexa will gladly repeat the question.

💥 SPECIAL FEATURE 💥

Irony in action: The player with the most incorrect answers (and likely the most drinks) will receive a fun, sarcastic remark at the end of the game. Laughter guaranteed!
Challenge your friends, show off your trivia skills, and find out who’s the master of the game—and who’s the master of drinks! 🍻

🍻💥 HAVE FUN AND PLAY RESPONSIBLY! 💥🍻


*The skill is recommended for an adult audience
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
